name: Flour Tortillas

ingredients.notes: or melted coconut oil or lard

instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, and baking powder.
Add the oil and mix until crumbly and evenly incorporated.
Gradually stir in the warm water until a dough forms. It should be soft but not sticky.
Knead the dough on a lightly floured surface for 3–5 minutes until smooth.
Cover and let the dough rest for 20–30 minutes.
Divide into 8 equal balls and roll each into a thin 6–8 inch circle.
Heat a dry skillet over medium-high heat. Cook each tortilla 30–60 seconds per side until golden spots appear.
Keep cooked tortillas stacked in a clean towel to stay warm and soft.
